mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, parent_id, order_type, code, move_date, move_man_id, move_man_code, move_man_name, receiver_id, receiver_code, receiver_name, move_reason, quantity_total, varieties_quantity, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time
mapper.select:
/** 下架时查出的商品列表 */ SELECT goods.id as goodsId, goods.code AS goodsCode, goods.name as goodsName, goods.barcode as barcode, goods.generic_name AS goodsGenericName, goods.dosage_id as dosageId, goods.dosage_name as dosageName, goods.specification AS goodsSpecification, goods.unit_id as unitId, goods.unit_id as unitName, goods.manufacturer_id AS manufacturerId, goods.manufacturer AS manufacturer, goods.place as goodsPlace, goods.approval_number as approvalNumber,
lot.lot_num as lotNumber, lot.id as lotId, lot.product_date as productDate, lot.valid_until as validDate,
ws.id as srcShelfId, ws.name as srcShelfName, st.shelf_status_desc as srcShelfStatusDesc,
st.usable_quantity as usableQuantity FROM saas_stock st,saas_goods_manage gm,saas_goods goods,saas_lot_number lot,saas_warehouse_shelf ws
WHERE goods.id = st.goods_id AND goods.id = gm.goods_id AND goods.enterprise_id = gm.enterprise_id
AND st.lot_id = lot.id
AND ws.id = st.shelf_id AND st.usable_quantity > 0 AND gm.status = '4' /** 必须不属于盘点状态 */ AND st.inventory_status = '0' AND st.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
and ( INSTR(goods.name,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.code,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.pinyin_code,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.approval_number,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.barcode,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.generic_name,#{param}))

/** 过期时查出的商品列表 */ SELECT goods.id as goodsId, goods.code AS goodsCode, goods.name as goodsName, goods.barcode as barcode, goods.generic_name AS goodsGenericName, goods.dosage_id as dosageId, goods.dosage_name as dosageName, goods.specification AS goodsSpecification, goods.unit_id as unitId, goods.unit_id as unitName, goods.manufacturer_id AS manufacturerId, goods.manufacturer AS manufacturer, goods.place as goodsPlace, goods.approval_number as approvalNumber,
lot.lot_num as lotNumber, lot.id as lotId, lot.product_date as productDate, lot.valid_until as validDate,
ws.id as srcShelfId, ws.name as srcShelfName, st.shelf_status_desc as srcShelfStatusDesc,
st.usable_quantity as usableQuantity FROM saas_stock st,saas_goods goods,saas_lot_number lot,saas_warehouse_shelf ws
where goods.id = st.goods_id
AND st.lot_id = lot.id
AND ws.id = st.shelf_id AND st.usable_quantity > 0 /** 必须不属于盘点状态 */ AND st.inventory_status = '0' AND st.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} /** 批号有效期小于今天 */ AND lot.valid_until < #{zero}
and ( INSTR(goods.name,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.code,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.pinyin_code,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.approval_number,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.barcode,#{param}) or INSTR(goods.generic_name,#{param}))
mapper.insert: insert into saas_shelf_move (id, enterprise_id, parent_id, order_type, code, move_date, move_man_id, move_man_code, move_man_name, receiver_id, receiver_code, receiver_name, move_reason, quantity_total, varieties_quantity, status, remark, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, create_time, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{moveManId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moveManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moveManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receiverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moveReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update saas_shelf_move
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
move_date = #{moveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
move_man_id = #{moveManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
move_man_code = #{moveManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
move_man_name = #{moveManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
receiver_code = #{receiverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
move_reason = #{moveReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update saas_shelf_move set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, move_date = #{moveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, move_man_id = #{moveManId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, move_man_code = #{moveManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, move_man_name = #{moveManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receiver_code = #{receiverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, move_reason = #{moveReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
